!Fishermen's Guild Member: Around the Orc Village,if you hunt *elder prairie keltirs, kasha wolves, rakeclaw imp hunters, maraku werewolves, greystone golems, kasha fang spiders, kasha imps, grave keepers and undead slaves*, you can get the sweet aromatic fluid the water spirits love.
